text: Soni chichi akwete ŵanganyao chaangaalagaachisya Allah, kutendaga ŵanganyao ali nkusiŵilila (ŵandu) kwinjila mu Nsikiti Wakuchimbichika (wa Maaka), soni nganaŵa akuuchengeta ŵakwe? Pangali ŵampaka aŵe akuuchengeta ŵakwe ni ikaŵeje ŵakun'jogopa (Allah), nambo ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao ngaakumanyilila
